data.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: I think it only makes sense to seek out and identify structures of authority, hierarchy, and domination in every aspect of life, and to challenge them; unless a justification for them can be given, they are illegitimate, and should be dismantled, to increase the scope of human freedom.
data.author: Noam Chomsky

data.quote: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.
data.author: Isaac Asimov

data.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
data.author: Marilyn vos Savant

data.quote: Talent is a wonderful thing, but it won't carry a quitter.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
data.author: C.S. Lewis

data.quote: The best way out is always through.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
data.author: Latin Proverb

data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
data.author: Moliere

data.quote: Bad times have scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, it turned into a butterfly.
data.author: Proverb

data.quote: It’s not what you look at that matters, it’s what you see.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.
data.author: Washington Irving
